name: GetEnterpriseUsers
description:
Retrieve users from a Trello enterprise, with optional filters.

Use this tool to get information about users in a Trello enterprise, such as licensed members or board guests. The response is paginated, providing up to 100 users per request.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello enterprise to retrieve users from.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: active_since_date
parameters.description: Return only users active since this date (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: inactive_since_date
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive). Provide the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: search_value_filter
parameters.description: Filter users by email address or full name starting with this value.

value_schema.description: Returns members with email address or full name that start with the search value.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for returning the next set of results in a paginated response. Use the cursor from the response to fetch subsequent batches.

value_schema.description: Cursor to return next set of results, use cursor returned in the response to query the next batch.

parameters.name: licensed_members_only
parameters.description: If true, return only members with a Trello license. If false, return only those without a license. If omitted, return both.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who possess a license for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who do not. If unspecified, both licensed and unlicensed members will be returned.

parameters.name: return_deactivated_members
parameters.description: Return deactivated members when true; active members when false. Unspecified returns all members.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who have been deactivated for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who have not. If unspecified, both active and deactivated members will be returned.

parameters.name: include_collaborators
parameters.description: Set to true to include members who are board guests (without a license). False excludes them. If unspecified, both are returned.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are guests on one or more boards in the corresponding Trello Enterprise (but do not possess a license); when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both guests and non-guests will be returned.

parameters.name: return_managed_members
parameters.description: Set to true to return only members managed by the Trello Enterprise, false to exclude managed members. If not set, both are returned.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are managed by the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both managed and unmanaged members will be returned.

parameters.name: include_administrators_only
parameters.description: If true, returns only administrators of the Trello Enterprise. If false, returns only non-administrators. If unspecified, returns both.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are administrators of the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both admin and non-admin members will be returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are administrators of the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both admin and non-admin members will be returned.

parameters.name: activeSince
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: inactiveSince
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Returns members with email address or full name that start with the search value.

value_schema.description: Returns members with email address or full name that start with the search value.

value_schema.description: Cursor to return next set of results, use cursor returned in the response to query the next batch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.
